title: Microsoft Surface Duo review: double troubles
description: The Surface Duo  Microsoft is back into the phone game with its own Android device. It's a two-screened folding phone that runs all of Microsoft's best apps. But making the device so thin and spending so much time on development means that there are some compromises. In this review, Dieter Bohn looks at the camera, the software, and the hardware.
